org.eclipse.scada.core.client

Class AutoReconnectController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.scada.core.client.AutoReconnectController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectionStateListener

    public class AutoReconnectController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConnectionStateListener
    A automatic reconnect controller which keeps connection in the requested state

    In order to use the reconnect controller put the connection in the constructor and call connect(). 

     
 Connection connection = ...;
 AutoReconnectController controller = new AutoReconnectController ( connection );
 controller.connect ();

    The AutoReconnectController needs to be disposed since 0.17.0

    Since:
    0.12.0
